verses.verse: Be <WG1096> ye therefore<WG3767> followers<WG3402> of God<WG2316> as<WG5613> dear<WG27> children: <WG5043>

And <WG2532> walk<WG4043> in<WG1722> love,<WG26> as<WG2531> Christ<WG5547> also<WG2532> hath loved<WG25> us,<WG2248> and<WG2532> hath given<WG3860> himself<WG1438> for<WG5228> us<WG2257> an offering<WG4376> and<WG2532> a sacrifice<WG2378> to God<WG2316> for<WG1519> a sweetsmelling<WG2175> savor.<WG3744>

But <WG1161> fornication,<WG4202> and<WG2532> all<WG3956> uncleanness,<WG167> or<WG2228> covetousness,<WG4124> let it not be once named<WG3366> <WG3687> among<WG1722> you,<WG5213> as<WG2531> becometh<WG4241> saints;<WG40>
Neither <WG2532> filthiness,<WG151> nor<WG2532> foolish talking,<WG3473> nor<WG2228> jesting,<WG2160> which are not convenient:<WG433> <WG3756> but<WG235> rather<WG3123> giving of thanks.<WG2169>

For <WG1063> this<WG5124> ye know,<WG2075> <WG1097> that<WG3754> no<WG3756> whoremonger,<WG4205> nor<WG2228> unclean person,<WG169> nor<WG2228> covetous man,<WG4123> who<WG3739> is<WG2076> an idolater,<WG1496> hath<WG2192> any<WG3956> inheritance<WG2817> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> kingdom<WG932> of Christ<WG5547> and<WG2532> of God.<WG2316>

Let no man<WG3367> deceive<WG538> you<WG5209> with vain<WG2756> words:<WG3056> for<WG1063> because<WG1223> of these things<WG5023> cometh<WG2064> the<WG3588> wrath<WG3709> of God<WG2316> upon<WG1909> the<WG3588> children<WG5207> of disobedience.<WG543>
Be <WG1096> not<WG3361> ye therefore<WG3767> partakers<WG4830> with them.<WG846>
For <WG1063> ye were<WG2258> sometimes<WG4218> darkness,<WG4655> but<WG1161> now<WG3568> are ye light<WG5457> in<WG1722> the Lord:<WG2962> walk<WG4043> as<WG5613> children<WG5043> of light: <WG5457>
(For <WG1063> the<WG3588> fruit<WG2590> of the<WG3588> Spirit<WG4151> is in<WG1722> all<WG3956> goodness<WG19> and<WG2532> righteousness<WG1343> and<WG2532> truth;)<WG225>
Proving <WG1381> what<WG5101> is<WG2076> acceptable<WG2101> unto the<WG3588> Lord.<WG2962>
And <WG2532> have no fellowship<WG4790> <WG3361> with the<WG3588> unfruitful<WG175> works<WG2041> of darkness,<WG4655> but<WG1161> rather<WG3123> <WG2532> reprove<WG1651> them.
For <WG1063> it is<WG2076> a shame<WG149> even<WG2532> to speak<WG3004> of those things which are done<WG1096> of<WG5259> them<WG846> in secret.<WG2931>

But <WG1161> all things<WG3956> that are reproved<WG1651> are made manifest<WG5319> by<WG5259> the<WG3588> light:<WG5457> for<WG1063> whatsoever<WG3956> doth make manifest<WG5319> is<WG2076> light.<WG5457>

Wherefore <WG1352> he saith,<WG3004> Awake<WG1453> thou that sleepest,<WG2518> and<WG2532> arise<WG450> from<WG1537> the<WG3588> dead,<WG3498> and<WG2532> Christ<WG5547> shall give thee light.<WG2017> <WG4671>
See <WG991> then<WG3767> that<WG4459> ye walk<WG4043> circumspectly,<WG199> not<WG3361> as<WG5613> fools,<WG781> but<WG235> as<WG5613> wise,<WG4680>
Redeeming <WG1805> the<WG3588> time,<WG2540> because<WG3754> the<WG3588> days<WG2250> are<WG1526> evil.<WG4190>
Wherefore <WG1223> <WG5124> be<WG1096> ye not<WG3361> unwise,<WG878> but<WG235> understanding<WG4920> what<WG5101> the<WG3588> will<WG2307> of the<WG3588> Lord<WG2962> is.
And <WG2532> be not drunk<WG3182> <WG3361> with wine,<WG3631> wherein<WG1722> <WG3739> is<WG2076> excess;<WG810> but<WG235> be filled<WG4137> with<WG1722> the Spirit;<WG4151>

Speaking <WG2980> to yourselves<WG1438> in psalms<WG5568> and<WG2532> hymns<WG5215> and<WG2532> spiritual<WG4152> songs,<WG5603> singing<WG103> and<WG2532> making melody<WG5567> in<WG1722> your<WG5216> heart<WG2588> to the<WG3588> Lord;<WG2962>

Giving thanks<WG2168> always<WG3842> for<WG5228> all things<WG3956> unto God<WG2316> and<WG2532> the Father<WG3962> in<WG1722> the name<WG3686> of our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ;<WG5547>
Submitting yourselves<WG5293> one to another<WG240> in<WG1722> the fear<WG5401> of God.<WG2316>
Wives, <WG1135> submit yourselves<WG5293> unto your own<WG2398> husbands,<WG435> as<WG5613> unto the<WG3588> Lord.<WG2962>

For <WG3754> the<WG3588> husband<WG435> is<WG2076> the head<WG2776> of the<WG3588> wife,<WG1135> even<WG2532> as<WG5613> Christ<WG5547> is the head<WG2776> of the<WG3588> church:<WG1577> and<WG2532> he<WG846> is<WG2076> the savior<WG4990> of the<WG3588> body.<WG4983>

Therefore <WG235> as<WG5618> the<WG3588> church<WG1577> is subject unto<WG5293> Christ,<WG5547> so<WG3779> let the<WG3588> wives<WG1135> be to their own<WG2398> husbands<WG435> in<WG1722> every thing.<WG3956>

Husbands, <WG435> love<WG25> your<WG1438> wives,<WG1135> even as<WG2531> Christ<WG5547> also<WG2532> loved<WG25> the<WG3588> church,<WG1577> and<WG2532> gave<WG3860> himself<WG1438> for<WG5228> it;<WG846>
That <WG2443> he might sanctify<WG37> and cleanse<WG2511> it<WG846> with the<WG3588> washing<WG3067> of water<WG5204> by<WG1722> the word,<WG4487>

That <WG2443> he might present<WG3936> it<WG846> to himself<WG1438> a glorious<WG1741> church,<WG1577> not<WG3361> having<WG2192> spot,<WG4695> or<WG2228> wrinkle,<WG4512> or<WG2228> any<WG5100> such thing;<WG5108> but<WG235> that<WG2443> it should be<WG5600> holy<WG40> and<WG2532> without blemish.<WG299>
So <WG3779> ought<WG3784> men<WG435> to love<WG25> their<WG1438> wives<WG1135> as<WG5613> their own<WG1438> bodies.<WG4983> He that loveth<WG25> his<WG1438> wife<WG1135> loveth<WG25> himself.<WG1438>

For <WG1063> no man<WG3762> ever yet<WG4218> hated<WG3404> his own<WG1438> flesh;<WG4561> but<WG235> nourisheth<WG1625> and<WG2532> cherisheth<WG2282> it,<WG846> even<WG2532> as<WG2531> the<WG3588> Lord<WG2962> the<WG3588> church: <WG1577>
For <WG3754> we are<WG2070> members<WG3196> of his<WG846> body,<WG4983> of<WG1537> his<WG846> flesh,<WG4561> and<WG2532> of<WG1537> his<WG846> bones.<WG3747>

For this cause<WG473> <WG5127> shall a man<WG444> leave<WG2641> his<WG848> father<WG3962> and<WG2532> mother,<WG3384> and<WG2532> shall be joined<WG4347> unto<WG4314> his<WG848> wife,<WG1135> and<WG2532> they two<WG1417> shall be<WG2071> one<WG3391> flesh.<WG4561>
This <WG5124> is<WG2076> a great<WG3173> mystery:<WG3466> but<WG1161> I<WG1473> speak<WG3004> concerning<WG1519> Christ<WG5547> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> church.<WG1577>

Nevertheless <WG4133> let every one<WG1538> of you<WG5210> <WG2532> in particular<WG2596> <WG1520> so<WG3779> love<WG25> his<WG1438> wife<WG1135> even as<WG5613> himself;<WG1438> and<WG1161> the<WG3588> wife<WG1135> see that<WG2443> she reverence<WG5399> her husband.<WG435>
